On Nov 22, 2021, at 6:27 PM, BOBBI C STERNHEIM •c> wrote: 
Good evening-
We have conferred with the government and they have agreed to serve the moving parties after applying appropriate redactions. 
They have informed us that the EVCP has been served. We will inform the Court when the government has served the remaining 
parties. 
Best-
Bobbi

Counsel: 
Please confirm as soon as possible that a copy of the response was served on counsel for the moving parties. 
Sincerely, 
Chambers of the Hon. Alison J. Nathan 
From: Nicole Simmons
Sent: Monday, November 22,  2021 1:40 PM 
To: Nathan NYSD Chambers 
Cc: Jeff Pagliuca a; Laura Menninger 
; bcsternheim mac.com <bcsternheim@ 
mac.com);
Subject: U.S. v. Maxwell, Case No. 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) [Maxwell's Resp to Ltr. Motns to Quash EVCP Sub 
CAUTION - EXTERNAL: 
Dear Judge Nathan: 
At the request of Jeffrey Pagliuca, please see attached Ms. Maxwell's Response to the Letter Motions to Quash her Rule 17(c) 
subpoena to the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program. 
Pursuant to our established protocol, we are submitting the Response to the Court under temporary seal to allow the government to 
propose any redactions it deems necessary. 
EFTA00014711

Regards, 
Nicole 
Nicole Simmons 
Haddon, Morgan and 
Foreman, P.C. 
150 East 10th Avenue 
Denver, Colorado

www.hmflaw.com

clicking on links. 
EFTA00014712
